page.title: 19Glossary.
page.content: {Cyw}-a young chicken or any young animal esp.a colt or foal. {Nant Ciwc-}a stream forming the eastern boundary of the community. {Cue -}(from Eng. -a shoe for cattle. {Heol-y-Cyw}- the Road or Way of the Cicken? {Mynydd-y-Gaer- }Mountain of the Fort. {Cefn Hirgoed}- Ridge of the Long Wood. {Cwm Nant Crymlyn-}Valley of the R.Crymlyn.(western boundary of area) {Parc Bach-}Little Field or Park. {Drefach-}Little Homestead. {Pant Hirwaun-}the dingle of the Long Meadow. {Heol-laethog-}Milky Way.(a hamlet to the west of Heol-y-Cyw.) {Wern Tarw-}the marshy meadow of the Bull.(a hamlet to the east of Heol-y- Cyw.
